title: Average daily television viewing time in France 2005 to 2018
summary: Overall Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm) has increased over the Year.

Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm) is roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly decreasing from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014, and finally roughly constant from 2014 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm), about 3.5 was reported at Year 2012
The lowest Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm), of value 3.24 was reported at Year 2008
min_summary: In general Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm) has stayed the same over the Year.

Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm) is roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly decreasing from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014, and finally roughly constant from 2014 to 2016.
